com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core.AccountController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockAccountController

    public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that handles login and account creation. Not reliant upon Rider/Driver being instantiated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new Login controller.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String username,
            android.content.Context context)
        Logs the user in with their desired username. The name must be at least five characters long. Rider and Driver controller classes are instantiated with a Profile generated from the username. Also begins to poll the server to update Rider's openRequests and Driver's acceptedRequests.
        Parameters:
        username - The user's username.
        Returns:
        true if the login was successful.

      • createNewAccount

        public boolean createNewAccount(Profile profile)
        Creates a new account if the username is unique.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile of the new account.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if the username is not unique

      • editAccount

        public void editAccount(Profile oldProfile,
               Profile newProfile)
        Edits an account.
        Parameters:
        oldProfile - Profile before editing.
        newProfile - Profile after editing.

      • checkUserExists

        protected boolean checkUserExists(java.lang.String username)
